projects.title: React Velocity Starter
projects.shortDescription: Production-ready React TypeScript starter template with modern tooling
projects.description: A comprehensive React TypeScript starter template designed to accelerate web development with modern tooling and best practices. Features feature-based architecture, testing suite, internationalization, and automated code generation.
challenges: Creating a flexible architecture that scales with project complexity
Balancing developer experience with production optimization
Integrating multiple modern tools without configuration conflicts
learnings: Advanced Vite configuration and optimization techniques
Modern React patterns and state management with Zustand
projects.industryImpact: Provides developers with a comprehensive foundation for modern React applications, reducing initial setup time and ensuring best practices from project inception.

projects.title: React UI Kit
projects.shortDescription: Comprehensive component library with 30+ production-ready components
projects.description: A modern React component library built with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Radix UI. Features comprehensive accessibility support, extensive testing, and optimized bundle size.
features: Advanced data tables with sorting and filtering
challenges: Ensuring consistent accessibility across all components
Managing complex state interactions in data tables
Optimizing bundle size while maintaining functionality
learnings: Advanced TypeScript patterns for component APIs
Performance optimization techniques for large component libraries
Accessibility best practices and testing strategies

metrics.impact: Reduced development time by 40% for new projects

projects.industryImpact: Streamlined frontend development process for multiple client projects, establishing consistent design patterns and reducing code duplication across the organization.
